modules.title: Install Google Chrome
modules.description: Create a policy to deploy Google Chrome to all managed computers
modules.prompt: Create a Jamf policy to install Google Chrome on all computers

modules.title: macOS Version Smart Group
modules.description: Smart group targeting computers running specific macOS versions
modules.prompt: Create a smart group for computers running macOS 14 or higher

modules.title: Wi-Fi Configuration
modules.description: Configuration profile for enterprise Wi-Fi settings
modules.prompt: Create a configuration profile for enterprise Wi-Fi with WPA2 Enterprise authentication

modules.title: Software Update Policy
modules.prompt: Create a policy to automatically install macOS software updates

modules.title: MacBook Smart Group
modules.description: Target all MacBook devices in your fleet
modules.prompt: Create a smart group for all MacBook Pro and MacBook Air computers

modules.title: Security Settings
modules.prompt: Create a configuration profile to enable FileVault encryption and require strong passwords
